org.xlattice.httpd

Class HttpCListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xlattice.httpd.HttpParser
      • org.xlattice.httpd.HttpCListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xlattice.transport.ConnectionListener

    public class HttpCListener
extends HttpParser
implements org.xlattice.transport.ConnectionListener
    Constructs an HTTP client connection listener. This will normally be created by a SchedulableConnector. XXX THERE IS A KNOWN PROBLEM WITH MESSAGES OVER XXX SchedulableTcpConnection.CNX_BUFSIZE, currently 64KB
    Author:
    Jim Dixon

      • dataReceived

        public void dataReceived()
        If version 0.9, the entire response is the entityBody. Otherwise, the first part of the message must be parsed, then everything after the blank line is the entity body. XXX For the moment assume that if version 1.x, then everything XXX up to the blank line must be in the first packet.
        Specified by:
        dataReceived in interface org.xlattice.transport.ConnectionListener

      • parseStatusLine

        public HttpResponse parseStatusLine(java.nio.ByteBuffer inBuf)
                             throws MessageFormatException
        Parse the first part of an HTTP response, creating the data structure. Any of CR, LF, or CRLF is a line ending.
        Parameters:
        inBuf - reference to dataIn, a convenience for testing
        Returns:
        reference to the HttpResponse created
        Throws:
        MessageFormatException
